General.Name: Dirui Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Dirui Industrial Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of medical inspection products in the People's Republic of China. The company provides medical instruments and supporting test strip reagents. It offers urine and biochemical analysis, chemiluminescence immunoassay, gynecological secretion analysis, blood cell analysis, coagulation analysis, and integrated laboratory. Dirui Industrial Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Changchun, the People's Republic of China.
